column2: Open your spell list to see available spells.
Close your spell list and access other decisions.
Cast the Dispel spell, cleansing yourself of all temporary magical effects, including beneficial ones.
Cast the Longevity spell, greatly increasing your lifespan. This has a small chance of failure, where nothing will happen.
Cast the Detect Thoughts spell, increasing your chance of dicovering plots in your court.
The Comprehend Languages spell temporarily increases your diplomatic ability.
Cast the Forget Past spell, removing almost all opinions of the target towards you.
§GThis is merely a reminder that you have this spell as a §Rtargeted decision§!\n\nCast the Forget Past spell, removing almost all opinions of the target towards you.
The Charm Person spell temporarily increases the target's opinion of you, but afterwards they'll realise what you've done and their opinion will go down.

§GThis is merely a reminder that you have this spell as a §Rtargeted decision§!\n\nThe Charm Person spell temporarily increases the target's opinion of you, but afterwards they'll realise what you've done and their opinion will go down.
Cast the Crown of Madness spell, rendering the target temporarily insane.
§GThis is merely a reminder that you have this spell as a §Rtargeted decision§!\n\nCast the Crown of Madness spell, rendering the target temporarily insane.
Cast the Dominate Person spell, guaranteeing their loyalty for a period of time.
§GThis is merely a reminder that you have this spell as a §Rtargeted decision§!\n\nCast the Dominate Person spell, guaranteeing their loyalty for a period of time.
Cast the Maddening Darkness spell, dealing morale damage to troops in the enemy army.
Cast the Phantasmal Force spell, summoning a unit of illusory soldiers to aid in your wars.
Cast the Phantasmal Killer spell, giving the target various negative effects.
§GThis is merely a reminder that you have this spell as a §Rtargeted decision§!\n\nCast the Phantasmal Killer spell, giving the target various negative effects.
Cast the Mind Prison spell, rendering the target temporarily incapable.
§GThis is merely a reminder that you have this spell as a §Rtargeted decision§!\n\nCast the Mind Prison spell, rendering the target temporarily incapable.
Cast the Longstrider spell on yourself, causing any armies you are leading to move faster for two months.
Cast the Fireball spell, causing minor damage to enemy troops.
Cast the Magic Missile spell, attempting to wound or kill the target.
§GThis is merely a reminder that you have this spell as a §Rtargeted decision§!\n\nCast the Magic Missile spell, attempting to wound or kill the target.
Cast the Lightning Bolt spell, attempting to kill, or at least wound, a leader in an enemy army.
Cast the Wall of Stone spell, increasing the fort level of a besieged province.
§GThis is merely a reminder that you have this spell as a §Rsettlement decision§!\n\nCast the Wall of Stone spell, increasing the fort level of a besieged province.
Cast the Conjure Elementals spell, spawning a group of elemental troops to fight for you for a few months.
Cast the Spell Mantle spell, increasing your resistance to hostile magical effects.
Cast the Legend Lore spell, gaining bonuses on diplomacy, stewardship and learning.
Cast the Dragon Transformation spell, briefly increasing your skill at personal combat.
Cast the Incendiary Cloud spell, dealing damage to troops in the enemy army.
Cast the Planar Binding spell, summoning a fiend to serve you. You have no control over what kind of fiend is bound.
Cast the Create Homunculus spell, creating a little construct to aid you, at the additional cost of a wound.
Cast the Summon Lesser Demons spell, conjuring up an army of outsiders to fight for you for a few months.
Cast the Greater Planar Binding spell, summoning a fiend with good stats to serve you. You have no control over what kind of fiend is bound.
Cast the Animate Dead spell, summoning a force of undead troops.\n\n§GThere is also a §Rsettlement decisions§G version of this spell!§!
Cast the Animate Dead spell, summoning a force of undead troops. If cast on a province populated by the living, this will cause a negative reaction.
Cast the Bestow Curse spell, lowering the target's attributes for a while.
§GThis is merely a reminder that you have this spell as a §Rtargeted decision§!\n\nCast the Bestow Curse spell, lowering the target's attributes for a while.
Cast the Blight spell, unleashing a disease upon a province. Your character must have a very low opinion of the local ruler to use this decision.

§GThis is merely a reminder that you have this spell as a §Rsettlement decision§!\n\nCast the Blight spell, unleashing a disease upon a province. Your character must have a very low opinion of the local ruler to use this decision.
Cast the Lichdom spell, turning you into an ageless undead creature. This has a small chance of failure, where nothing will happen.
Cast the Phantom Steed spell, gaining a bonus to personal combat due to a temporary magical mount.
Cast the Planar Binding spell, summoning a genie to serve you.
Cast the Greater Planar Binding spell, summoning a genie with good stats to serve you.
Cast the Disintegrate spell, making an attempt to kill the target.
§GThis is merely a reminder that you have this spell as a §Rtargeted decision§!\n\nCast the Disintegrate spell, making an attempt to kill the target.
Cast the Chain Lightning spell, dealing damage to troops in the enemy army.
Cast the Slow spell, causing the targetted enemy commander's army to move slower.
§GThis is merely a reminder that you have this spell as a §Rtargeted decision§!\n\nCast the Slow spell, causing the targetted enemy commander's army to move slower.
Cast the Find Familiar spell, acquiring a small magical creature to act as a little helper and who can take the shapes of various small animals.
Cast the Reckless Dweomer spell, gaining a quantity of spell points back... but with a large risk of a wild magic surge instead.
Cast the Rage Spell, granting troops under your command increased damage, but decreased defence.
Cast the fabricate spell, reducing build costs in the settlement's province for a small while.
§GThis is merely a reminder that you have this spell as a §Rsettlement decision§!\n\nCast the fabricate spell, reducing build costs in the settlement's province for a small while.
Cast the Animate Objects spell, summoning a unit of constructs to aid in your wars.
Cast the Weird spell, dealing morale damage to troops in the enemy army.
Cast the Burn Path spell, preventing the target from using arcane spells for the duration.
§GThis is merely a reminder that you have this spell as a §Rtargeted decision§!\n\nCast the Burn Path spell, preventing the target from using arcane spells for the duration.
Cast the Lesser Restoration spell to cure a disease from the target character.
§GThis is merely a reminder that you have this spell as a §Rtargeted decision§!\n\nCast the Lesser Restoration spell to cure a disease from the target character.
Cast the Greater Restoration spell to cure all diseases from the target character.
§GThis is merely a reminder that you have this spell as a §Rtargeted decision§!\n\nCast the Greater Restoration spell to cure all diseases from the target character.
Cast the Heal spell to cure an injury on the target character.
§GThis is merely a reminder that you have this spell as a §Rtargeted decision§!\n\nCast the Heal spell to cure an injury on the target character.
Cast the Regeneration spell to cure injuries and restore lost limbs or disfigurement on the target character.
§GThis is merely a reminder that you have this spell as a §Rtargeted decision§!\n\nCast the Regeneration spell to cure injuries and restore lost limbs or disfigurement on the target character.
Cast the Mass Restoration spell to attempt to cure a disease from the target province.
Cast the Planar Binding spell, summoning an angel to serve you.
Cast the Greater Planar Binding spell, summoning an angel with good stats to serve you.

Cast the Control Weather spell, improving the weather in one of your provinces, or making it worse in someone else's province. Your character must have a very low opinion of the local ruler to use this decision.

§GThis is merely a reminder that you have this spell as a §Rsettlement decision§!\n\nCast the Control Weather spell, changing the weather in the province. Your character must have a very low opinion of the local ruler to use this decision.
